alert.note: Alert for McIntosh (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 23 at 9:08PM CDT until September 23 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MCINTOSH AND NORTH CENTRAL PITTSBURG COUNTIES... At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Raiford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Crowder... Canadian... Indianola... Stidham... Arrowhead State Park... Raiford... Vivian... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
